data.eml:eml: Two new Gammarus species (Crustacea, Amphipoda) from warm springs in the south-east pre-alpine area of the Zagros, Iran: habitats with physiological challenges

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zamanpoore, Mehrdad, Grabowski, Michal, Poeckl, Manfred, Schiemer, Friedrich (2010): Two new Gammarus species (Crustacea, Amphipoda) from warm springs in the south-east pre-alpine area of the Zagros, Iran: habitats with physiological challenges. Zootaxa 2546: 31-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196755
